resources.string: Touch and hold a widget to add it to Homescreen.
No more room on this Home screen
Allows an application to add shortcuts without user intervention.
Allows an application to read the settings and shortcuts in Home.
Allows an application to change the settings and shortcuts in Home.
This is a system application and cannot be uninstalled.
Up to %d categories can be selected.
Not enough space on internal storage
Select the grid size to show more or less on the Home Screen.
Drag the right bottom corner of the icon to resize it on the Home screen.
The Home screen and apps list are now unified.
To search for an app, use Google search.
You can go back to the UX 4.0 Home screen to use the apps list. Select the Home & app drawer in Home screen settings > Select Home.
You can rearrange or add apps to your Favorites Tray by touching and holding an icon and dragging it to where you want it.
Create a folder by dragging one icon on top of another. To rename the folder or change its color, open it and tap the folder name. Tap + to add apps to folder.
To get additional help or tips about using your tablet, refer to the Help app.
To get additional help or tips about using your phone, refer to the Help app.
You can explore all your apps on the Home screens by swiping. To find an app, use Google search or sort your apps by name.

"You can explore all your apps on the Home screens by swiping. To find an app, use Google search or sort your apps by name. In the Home screen settings, you can change the grid size to change how many apps are on a Home screen."
